name: Flight Timulator 2020
description:
Game made for Quakecon game jam. I wouldn't recommend playing it, but you can if you want.

Post-Release version coming out soon (this afternoon probably) that adds some things left out to meet the deadline. (functional checkpoints, menus, music+ambient noise)

Controls: ( if you don't have a 360 controller you're in for a bad even worse time)
Triggers - Throttle

Left Stick - Pitch/Roll

Right Stick - Yaw

Credits:

Tim Willits - Underwent horrific irreversible surgery to play the role of TimCopter

Title Music - "Banana Street" by Dark Cat
